price: Mu vy’ukuri, abatemera ko hariho ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa ngo baheze babwitegurire, Twabaryohereje ibikorwa vyabo bibi babibona ko ari vyiza, baranajuragirika mu kubura ico bafata n'ico bareka mu vyo bakora;
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati zayyannā lahum aʿmālahum fahum yaʿmahūna
